channel.title: Best looking game you've ever played?
channel.description:
NOT REALISTIC.
I want to know how varied you guys are. What's the best looking game you've ever played? When I say this, I mean something more along the lines of "best" stylistically. Not realisticly. Realism has been done to death. Let's see what else is out there?
Mine is Rez.
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cCh6WlK027I&feature=related']I mean come on.[/url]
Hands down. The game is fucking beautiful.

item.title: Best looking game you've ever played?
item.dc:creator: Java-O-To
item.description:
I have to agree with eternalness, Metro 2033 is a pretty good-looking game.

I also love the graphics in Dead Space, dark and shizzles!

Read full topic

item.description:
No, you can’t swim in the full version either. Id say that Metro 2033 is the best looking game i’ve played so far.

item.source: Best looking game you've ever played?

item.title: Best looking game you've ever played?
item.dc:creator: pfannkuchen_gesicht
item.description:
Medevilae:

Correct. I hope when I’m done with Mafia II a new GTA will be out, and with a decent story this time. Mafia II should set an example for Rockstar. I had almost forgotten how awesome the third person sandbox genre could be with a story and sexy graphics until now.

GTA4 had a great story, much deeper than from the older GTAs too

Read full topic

item.title: Best looking game you've ever played?
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
Chrillen:

But it does serve as an excuse for less impressive textures, shadows, colours and an inferior engine.

Correct. I hope when I’m done with Mafia II a new GTA will be out, and with a decent story this time. Mafia II should set an example for Rockstar. I had almost forgotten how awesome the third person sandbox genre could be with a story and sexy graphics until now.

item.source: Best looking game you've ever played?

item.title: Best looking game you've ever played?
item.dc:creator: Daedalus
item.description:
Chrillen:

But it does serve as an excuse for less impressive textures, shadows, colours and an inferior engine.

I never said it did. And I agree. But it isn’t just the engine, it’s the overall appeal of the game. I just love how colourful Mafia II is.
Even if GTA ran on the same engine, but remained the same look it had now I’d like Mafia II more.
But that’s just preference.

I do find smith009’s comment to be very interesting.

Read full topic
item.source: Best looking game you've ever played?

item.title: Best looking game you've ever played?
item.dc:creator: Chrillen
item.description:
Daedalus:

That doesn’t serve as an excuse for the lack of optimization.

But it does serve as an excuse for less impressive textures, shadows, colours and an inferior engine.

Read full topic

item.title: Best looking game you've ever played?
item.dc:creator: Daedalus
item.description:
Chrillen:

It is also two years older.

That doesn’t serve as an excuse for the lack of optimization.

item.source: Best looking game you've ever played?

item.title: Best looking game you've ever played?
item.dc:creator: Chrillen
item.description:
Daedalus:

I think GTA IV looks terrible compared to Mafia II and it runs twice as slow.
GTA IV has less impressive textures, shadows, colours and it’s just generally inferior to Mafia’s engine in pretty much every way if you ask me.

It is also two years older.

Read full topic
item.source: Best looking game you've ever played?

item.title: Best looking game you've ever played?
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
I liked GTA4 and I thought the graphics were good, but the first thing that comes to mind when I think of its visuals is “orange and brown”.

When I first stepped out of the house in the Mafia 2 demo, I was taken over at how colorful it was. It was almost perfect. Just tone down the bloom a bit and it looks pretty much real.

Read full topic
item.source: Best looking game you've ever played?

item.title: Best looking game you've ever played?
item.dc:creator: Daedalus
item.description:
I think GTA IV looks terrible compared to Mafia II and it runs twice as slow.
GTA IV has less impressive textures, shadows, colours and it’s just generally inferior to Mafia’s engine in pretty much every way if you ask me.

I’m also adding Mafia II to my list of prettiest games.

Read full topic

item.title: Best looking game you've ever played?
item.dc:creator: jambo
item.description:
Mafia II on PC looks damn good, can’t wait for it to come out!

1680×1050 494 KB

jerry:

jambo, you got any high-res version of the first Mirrors Edge picture ?

Sorry, the guy I got that off was using super sampling and running at a lower res to get maximum prettiness out of his screenshots.

Read full topic
item.source: Best looking game you've ever played?

item.title: Best looking game you've ever played?
item.dc:creator: b737lvr
item.description:
ugh, Halo uses “Fake HD”. Where the Game is REALLY brown. you don’t notice it after a while. GTAIV does that as well. Use ENB Series in GTAIV and you will quickly see what i mean. Uncharted 2 had the feature of turning on Fake HD where it turns up the bloom and makes it brown. After playing for a while you forget it is on and than you switch it back to normal and you just about fall over backwards and need to change your underpants.

Read full topic
item.source: Best looking game you've ever played?

item.title: Best looking game you've ever played?
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
realMyst = a not pre-rendered Myst recreation.

Also, Halo is an ok game, but it doesn’t fit into “best looking games you’ve ever played,” at all.


Once again, good game, but the graphics are just “ok.”

Read full topic
item.source: Best looking game you've ever played?

item.title: Best looking game you've ever played?
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
The idea of Myst/Riven is to solve puzzles in gorgeous environments, whether they are pre-rendered or not.

And it sure as hell succeeds in being gorgeous looking.

item.source: Best looking game you've ever played?

item.title: Best looking game you've ever played?
item.dc:creator: Someonerandm
item.description:
If I can’t explore an environment and see the details, I don’t think of its graphics as being as good. I like detail overall, not just in select screenshots, and that carries to when a game is just screenshots.

Read full topic

item.title: Best looking game you've ever played?
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
